TextLibrary.Text: Now the MRI will be on our trail again.
Now the MRI will be on our trail again.
At least Cytech don't seem to be hunting us.
At least Cytech don't seem to be hunting us.
We should head for the Krystallus System. MRI decimated it years ago, trying to wipe out the Krystalli. It's a perfect place to hide while we plan what to do next.
We should head for the Krystallus System. MRI decimated it years ago, trying to wipe out the Krystalli. It's a perfect place to hide while we plan what to do next.
